name: War Card Game - Royal Battle
description:
Simply and playful, this game is adapted for all ages. With one's family, friend or against the computer, the goal is simple : Win all the cards !

Features :
-----------
* Number of players : From 1 to 2.
* Number of cards : Deck of 32 or 52 cards. Jokers is in option.
* Dealing : Random or by colors.
* Language : English, French, Italian, Portuguese, Deutsch, Sverige, Dutch and Spanish.
* No advertisements

Rules :
--------
* Play against computer or with a friend.
* Choose the number of cards. You can include 2 Jokers to a deck.
* Choose the type of dealing.
* Each player play the first card of his deck.
* The player who has play the stronger card win the round.
* Value of the cards : 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, Jack, Queen, King, Ace and Joker. Joker is the best one.
* The winner is the one who is holding all the cards.
